column4: good day, i have a lenovo w510 with 12.4 and i cant get my secondary display working ..anyone have suggestions ?
have you looked in the display control panel?
yes, it doesnt show up there.
only the internal display is there.
look on your f1-f12 keys. is there a logo of a display on any of them? you may have to use the fn or ctrl key to turn on the secondary monitor.  laptops disable by default to save power
have you looked in the additional drivers application to make sure you have non-generic drivers installed?
yes, i have loaded the two different versions that are presented to me in the additional drivers and rebooted with both. no go :(
ive googled and cant seem to find anything either.
what video card are you using?
and your desktop effects are working properly yggdrasil?
yea everything works fine, except im trapped on the lapto pscreen.
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: NVIDIA Corporation GT216 [Quadro FX 880M] (rev a2)
in the display control panel is there a second monitor picture displayed at all?  are you 100% that the 2nd monitor is plugged in? does it say no signal?
